law.catch_line: An authority shall consist of five members....

text.section: An authority shall consist of five members.
The residency requirements, means of appointment, qualifications and terms of office of these members shall be provided by local law.
The officers and employees required by an authority shall be appointed as provided by local law.

An act of the authority may not be challenged on the basis of the absence of qualifications of a member of the authority if the member:
Has been appointed by the appropriate authority designated by local law; and
Has taken the oath of office.
